sentences.sContent: Personally, I don’t think much of the idea.
sentences.sCn: 就个人而言，我认为这个主意不怎么样。

sentences.sContent: I personally think it’s too cold to go out.
sentences.sCn: 我个人认为太冷了不能出去。

synos.tran: 亲自地；当面；个别地；就自己而言

phrases.pCn: 就个人来说，就自己而言

words.tran: 人事消息栏；人称代名词
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize that you are only giving your own opinion about something
